item.description:
We can meet at the north parking lot off 138 in milton (exit 2B off 93 north.) the parking entrance is second 2nd entrance after blue hill ski area. From there it's a steep climb to the summit, but, well worth it on a clear day. there are several nice trails around the base of the hill, The loop I chose has some difficult portions, yet, there is much fun to be had.
MAtt
Hadn't gotten much response so I'd like to change date to Sunday. I believe te weather should be good then too
item.how_to_find_us: Back of North lot near trail head: there's a rest room / hut there too.
item.name: Great Blue Hill
